com.iha.emulator.utilities.watchers

Class MemoryChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.utilities.watchers.MemoryChecker

  • public class MemoryChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implemented by Singleton pattern. Used to continuously check state of operating system memory usage. Uses own timer set to 1 second.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky
